channel.title: Random thieve reward?
channel.description: Is there something i can add to a case to make a random thieve reward from a set of things?? and make a list of rewards from a thieving case SIDE NOTES: wtf is port forwarding-any1 have dungeon coords i can have? still cant get shops to work, ive narrowed it down to, im adding it wrong in client.java or not filling it out right, ohh another thing, can i set a limit in a case, like [code]case ####: sendMessage("You have to kill all 50 lessers before you advance)" else if(killcount = 50) teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy;[/code]anyway?

item.title: Random thieve reward?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Port forwarding is to get a no-ip.

item.title: Random thieve reward?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

Is there something i can add to a case to make a random thieve reward from a set of things??
and make a list of rewards from a thieving case
SIDE NOTES: wtf is port forwarding-any1 have dungeon coords i can have?
still cant get shops to work, ive narrowed it down to, im adding it wrong in client.java or not filling it out right,
ohh another thing, can i set a limit in a case, like

case ####: sendMessage("You have to kill all 50 lessers before you advance)" else if(killcount = 50) teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy;anyway?
